Readme

Variography.jl

[![][travis-img]][travis-url] [![][codecov-img]][codecov-url]

This package provides variogram models and tools for estimating empirical variograms from data. Variograms are extensively used in Kriging estimation, sequential Gaussian simulation, and many other geostatistical algorithms.

Installation

Get the latest stable release with Julia's package manager:

] add Variography

Usage

This package is part of the GeoStats.jl framework.

For examples of usage, please check the main documentation.

Asking for help

If you have any questions, please contact our community on the gitter channel.
